description: The Microsoft Office Specialist certification demonstrates proficiency in an Office application such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, and/or Outlook. This mini-series explains the certification, how to prepare for the exams, how to register for the exam, the exam format, and how to display your success.
descriptionMD: The Microsoft Office Specialist certification demonstrates proficiency in an Office application such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, and/or Outlook. This mini-series explains the certification, how to prepare for the exams, how to register for the exam, the exam format, and how to display your success.
name: MOS - Microsoft Office Specialist Certification
subtitle: MOS certification preparation

episodes.description: The Microsoft Office Specialist certification demonstrates proficiency in an Office application such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, and/or Outlook. This mini-series explains the certification, how to prepare for the exams, how to register for the exam, the exam format, and how to display your success.
episodes.title: Overview
episodes.transcript:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:01.861
[MUSIC]

2
00:00:01.861 --> 00:00:04.050
Hello, everyone and

3
00:00:04.050 --> 00:00:11.540
welcome to the Microsoft Office
Specialist Certification Series.

4
00:00:11.540 --> 00:00:13.191
My name is Vonne Smith.

5
00:00:13.191 --> 00:00:17.778
And in this course overview we are going
to be going over what exactly is in this

6
00:00:17.778 --> 00:00:19.110
series.

7
00:00:19.110 --> 00:00:20.540
Who is this for?

8
00:00:20.540 --> 00:00:23.370
And do I need to know anything
before I get started?

9
00:00:23.370 --> 00:00:27.220
So why don't we talk about
the certification preparation?

10
00:00:27.220 --> 00:00:30.360
I'm actually very excited
to do this series.

11
00:00:30.360 --> 00:00:35.770
I just recently I completed my
Master Office Specialist Certification.

12
00:00:35.770 --> 00:00:38.270
And so
I was pretty excited to do this because,

13
00:00:38.270 --> 00:00:40.320
well, it's fresh in my brain right now.

14
00:00:40.320 --> 00:00:44.900
So I wanna take you through well,
exactly what is this certification.

15
00:00:44.900 --> 00:00:46.330
Let's introduce it.

16
00:00:46.330 --> 00:00:47.070
Who is this for?

17
00:00:47.070 --> 00:00:49.930
Why would I want to do
this particular exam?

18
00:00:49.930 --> 00:00:51.730
How do I prepare for it?

19
00:00:51.730 --> 00:00:52.480
How do I study?

20
00:00:52.480 --> 00:00:54.920
Where do I get the exam objectives?

21
00:00:54.920 --> 00:00:58.900
How do I register to take
this exam through Certiport?

22
00:00:58.900 --> 00:01:00.370
That can be a little tricky.

23
00:01:00.370 --> 00:01:03.940
So I try to take you
through those little paths

24
00:01:03.940 --> 00:01:07.870
that they take you down that kind of
don't have the clearest directions.

25
00:01:07.870 --> 00:01:10.047
But I'll help you there,
give you some tips and

26
00:01:10.047 --> 00:01:11.910
tricks on how to actually take the exam.

27
00:01:11.910 --> 00:01:13.650
Like, what is the format?

28
00:01:13.650 --> 00:01:17.703
What do I need to expect when I
go into that testing center and

29
00:01:17.703 --> 00:01:20.470
sit down and take that 50 minute test?

30
00:01:20.470 --> 00:01:22.340
What is it gonna look like?

31
00:01:22.340 --> 00:01:24.100
So I'll get you really prepared for
actually taking the exam.

32
00:01:24.100 --> 00:01:28.050
And then, well, hey, you passed, great.

33
00:01:28.050 --> 00:01:28.860
What do I do?

34
00:01:28.860 --> 00:01:31.550
How can I show off that I
have this certification?

35
00:01:31.550 --> 00:01:35.260
We'll talk about our different badges and
some different websites and

36
00:01:35.260 --> 00:01:36.730
how to share it on socials.

37
00:01:36.730 --> 00:01:38.310
That will be a lot of fun.

38
00:01:39.420 --> 00:01:41.180
Who is this for?

39
00:01:41.180 --> 00:01:43.600
Anyone interested in
taking a certification.

40
00:01:43.600 --> 00:01:44.700
Okay well, that's pretty broad.

41
00:01:44.700 --> 00:01:47.680
But why would I want to do this?

42
00:01:47.680 --> 00:01:51.130
This could be anybody that
is coming out of school.

43
00:01:51.130 --> 00:01:54.600
This is actually a program
that a lot of middle and

44
00:01:54.600 --> 00:01:59.730
high school programs they incorporate
this actual certification.

45
00:01:59.730 --> 00:02:02.426
Now if you're a seasoned person
in the workforce, you're like,

46
00:02:02.426 --> 00:02:04.990
I'm taking a certification that
a middle schooler is taking?

47
00:02:04.990 --> 00:02:11.930
Well, what it does is it's going to show
proficiency in Microsoft Office products.

48
00:02:11.930 --> 00:02:16.298
As an end user, you have certified from
Microsoft, I know how to use Excel,

49
00:02:16.298 --> 00:02:18.020
I know how to use PowerPoint.

50
00:02:19.050 --> 00:02:21.175
So it can be used for career advancement.

51
00:02:21.175 --> 00:02:26.980
So maybe a promotion depends on
that particular certification.

52
00:02:26.980 --> 00:02:31.540
Maybe your organization offers
continuing education units,

53
00:02:31.540 --> 00:02:35.160
I think CEUs,
that maybe this could qualify for it.

54
00:02:35.160 --> 00:02:40.540
So this is all due to help better
yourself and advance your career.

55
00:02:42.100 --> 00:02:45.560
Now the prerequisites,
proficiency in Office applications.

56
00:02:45.560 --> 00:02:51.700
If you're like well I kinda know how
to use Word, but not really, wow.

57
00:02:51.700 --> 00:02:52.770
Should I not do this?

58
00:02:52.770 --> 00:02:55.338
No, definitely strive for this.

59
00:02:55.338 --> 00:02:59.700
This is why we have OfficeProTV,
which is, of course,

60
00:02:59.700 --> 00:03:02.600
affiliated and is a channel of ITProTV.

61
00:03:03.670 --> 00:03:08.680
So I want to show you and give you all
the resources throughout my other series,

62
00:03:08.680 --> 00:03:13.350
the Word essentials, the Word advance, the
Word expert and all of the other products.

63
00:03:13.350 --> 00:03:19.025
All of those series are to help
train you in this application and

64
00:03:19.025 --> 00:03:23.400
to have you become proficient
in that particular product.

65
00:03:23.400 --> 00:03:28.020
So this series is just gonna concentrate
on what you need to look towards and

66
00:03:28.020 --> 00:03:32.090
really focus on for studying for the exam.

67
00:03:32.090 --> 00:03:33.930
Knowing the product is one thing.

68
00:03:33.930 --> 00:03:38.120
But taking the exam,
that's why we have this particular series.

69
00:03:38.120 --> 00:03:42.200
So you need to know a little bit to start.

70
00:03:42.200 --> 00:03:47.040
And then watch the series, and then we'll
go ahead and we'll get you certified.

71
00:03:47.040 --> 00:03:48.390
Well, you'll get yourself certified.

72
00:03:48.390 --> 00:03:51.000
I'll just help you along the way.

73
00:03:51.000 --> 00:03:55.480
Like my other series,
I do have exercise files and notes.

74
00:03:55.480 --> 00:03:59.600
Now the exercise files are really more
of like the downloaded material from

75
00:03:59.600 --> 00:04:04.427
the sites that you can get on your
own if you go to certiport.com and

76
00:04:04.427 --> 00:04:05.666
so on and so forth.

77
00:04:05.666 --> 00:04:09.180
I do have some of my own materials
that I have made, some diagrams.

78
00:04:09.180 --> 00:04:10.610
Took stuff off the Internet and

79
00:04:10.610 --> 00:04:13.090
made it into a Word document
cuz I can't help myself.

80
00:04:13.090 --> 00:04:15.520
Of course I made a table of contents and
everything too.

81
00:04:15.520 --> 00:04:17.280
So, you can use that.

82
00:04:17.280 --> 00:04:21.360
Hopefully that would kind of
conglomerate altogether for you,

83
00:04:21.360 --> 00:04:25.940
or condense it down for
you and use my own materials.

84
00:04:25.940 --> 00:04:30.130
So all the links that I'm going to be
visiting throughout the different websites

85
00:04:30.130 --> 00:04:31.590
are in the episode notes.

86
00:04:31.590 --> 00:04:36.078
So definitely go ahead and get those ready
and print them out and check them off and

87
00:04:36.078 --> 00:04:37.600
get ready to be certified.

88
00:04:37.600 --> 00:04:44.582
[MUSIC]

episodes.description: Vonne and Ronnie introduce and explain the basics of the Microsoft Office Specialist certification - covering who, what, when, where, why, how, and how much.
episodes.title: Introduction to Microsoft Office Specialist

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Ronnie show where to find the different resources available to prepare for a MOS exam.
episodes.title: Prepare for an Exam

episodes.description: Registering for an exam can be a little tricky.  Ronnie and Vonne review how to purchase exam vouchers directly from Certiport and assign vouchers to yourself.
episodes.title: Register for an Exam

episodes.description: In this episode, Ronnie and Vonne explain the exam format as well as some tips and tricks for success.
episodes.title: Take the Exam

episodes.description: A certification is a proud achievement. Vonne and Ronnie show how to access your digital badges and share on different social media channels.  They also show you where to access your exam score reports and how to share your transcripts with others.
episodes.title: Show Off Your Success
